programme.title: Wildest Africa: Virungas: Land of Ice and Fire

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: The Andes: World in the Clouds

programme.title: Wildest India: The Himalayas: Surviving the Summits

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Nile: An African Odyssey
programme.desc: The Nile is the longest river in the world. Ancient Egypt, one of the history's most powerful civilizations, depended hugely upon it. Each year, it flooded, replenishing the fields with fertile silt. This automatic irrigation fueled Egypt's economy.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Caribbean: The Wild Side of Paradise

programme.desc: Photography has long been a vital tool in homicide investigations. A single image captures enough information to identify a suspect, and to preserve a vital clue long after a witness' memory fades.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Three hairs microscopic fibers a common trash bag ripped from a roll. Seemingly small and insignificant clues become a victim's silent witness.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The seven remaining chefs are called down to the dining room to discover two ice dancers performing a routine. Chef Ramsay explains ice dancing can be romantic, just as dessert can be. For their challenge they must cook an extraordinary dessert.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: In the first challenge, the final six chefs break through a case, retrieving a random ingredient they will have to cook with. The second challenge has each chef cooking with the same four ingredients. The third challenge is a surf and turf challenge.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The five chefs compete in Chef Ramsay's Taste It, Now Make It challenge, recreating his intricate eggs benedict dish. Later, the fish station struggles at dinner service, leaving the chef in charge of it in real danger of being sent home.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs undertake a tableside challenge, creating dishes for esteemed brigades acting as judges. Later, elimination surprises everyone, including Chef Ramsay.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Following emotional reunions with their proud parents, Chef Ramsay tasks the final two chefs with creating five meals in only 60 minutes, with the winner earning first pick for their brigade in the final challenge.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The two remaining chefs go head to head for the final time, before the new executive chef at Gordon Ramsay's Hell's Kitchen at Caesar's Palace is announced.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel does the unthinkable with his wild show car

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel continues the journey with his wild show car

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel attempts to complete his wild show car

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: An inside look at Full Custom Garage.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian takes on a new challenge for a high-end car show.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian goes on the hunt for his biggest build yet.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian kicks off the build with some crazy concepts.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian kicks off the build with some crazy concepts.

programme.title: Andromeda: A Rose in the Ashes
programme.desc: Dylan is imprisoned on a prison planet and must stage an escape as his crew tries to stage their own rescue.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Castalians board the Andromeda to finalize the charter for the New Commonwealth. When the leader is discovered dead, Tyr is the main suspect.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka learns that her father's former business partner deals in a highly addictive drug called F lash.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Andromeda discovers her sister ship, the Pax Magellanic. The crew aboard Pax is 300 years old, but have not aged a day.

programme.title: Andromeda: Music of a Distant Drum
programme.desc: Tyr crash lands the Eureka Maru on a Nietzschean planet and develops amnesia. He must remember what he is doing before the Nietzscheans discover him and his crate of stolen goods.

programme.title: Andromeda: Harper 2.0
programme.desc: Harper receives the gift of knowledge from a dying Perseid, only to discover that the Perseid was being sought by a bounty hunter who has now turned his attention to Harper.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Little Boy Lost
programme.desc: In 1957, nine-year-old Peter Boland was on holiday having the time of his life on a remote farm in New Zealand when he simply vanished without a trace. Peter’s older brother Gavin Boland, a self-confessed sceptic, turns to Sensing Murder’s psychics.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: A Mother's Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Otautau toddler Amber-Lee, aged two and a half, vanished from Kingston at the southern tip of Lake Wakatipu on October 17, 1992.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Psychics Revealed - Special
programme.desc: Behind the scenes with the psychics on the show.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Walk of Innocence
programme.desc: In 1970, eighteen-year-old Olive Waiker disappeared as she walked across Rotorua to babysit her nieces and nephews. Her semi-naked body was found hours later in a rest area south of the city..

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: 54 year old Simon Buis was savagely beaten and kicked to death in an Auckland park in 1980 by persons unknown. To this day, his killers have evaded capture.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Lost for Words
programme.desc: Spirited teenager Jayne Furlong dreamed of becoming a child psychologist - instead, she ended up a prostitute. In 1993, 17 year old Jayne vanished from her patch on Auckland's Karangahape Road.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Headless Body: The Kim Barry Murder
programme.desc: In 1981, the headless and fingerless body of 19-year-old Kim Narelle Barry was found dumped in the bush at a mountain lookout near Wollongong, south of Sydney.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killing Fields of Truro
programme.desc: For the 2008 launch of Crime Investigation Australia, CI presents the complete and compelling story of "The Killing Fields of Truro", one of the most infamous crimes in Australia and yet another set in Adelaide.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel
programme.desc: We examine two notorious abduction cases. The first case is the Graeme Thorne ransom kidnapping at Bondi in 1960. Thorne, aged eight, was the son of winners of the Sydney Opera House Lottery.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Body in the Sports Bag
programme.desc: A young Sydney man was found guilty of strangling his ex-girlfriend and stuffing the teenager's body in a cricket bag.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Hunt for a Killer: The Claremont Murders
programme.desc: This chilling CIA episode details the long and difficult investigation which began with the disappearance of 18-year-old secretary Sarah Spiers from a night club in the up-market Perth suburb of Claremont on Australia Day 1996.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Stranger than Fiction
programme.desc: Moira predicts a wave of terrible trouble – and Moira is never wrong.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: 12 and a Half Hours Behind
programme.desc: Tess returns to Drovers to discover she is ten weeks pregnant, but an even bigger shock is in store…

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Anniversary
programme.desc: Tess decides to hold a party to celebrate Nick’s life, but has she really accepted that he’s gone?

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Body And Soul
programme.desc: Alex is not coping with Nick’s death and disappears from his friends’ lives.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: New Beginnings
programme.desc: Alex and Sandra face death in a blazing inferno. And dreams torment both Stevie and Tess.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Lost and Found
programme.desc: Jodi reveals to Tess that they are sisters - but the news doesn't go over quite as Jodi hoped. Alex returns to the district...with his new fiance, Fiona, breaking Stevie's heart.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Pizza Pizza CEO Paul Goddard goes undercover in the nation’s number one pizza mega brand, and learns that making dough and delivering pizza serves up some challenges he never imagined.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: There Ghosts The Neighborhood
programme.desc: TAPSis called out to Joplin, Missouri to help 3 generations of afamilyliving on one haunted estate! Could both houses on the property harbor entities that couldbring harm to their children?

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Plot Thickens
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, owners of a haunted theatre in Woonsocket, Rhode Island buy the building next door and activity spikes! TAPS investigates both buildings to see if spirits are traveling between the two locations.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fortress of Phantoms
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads tothe historic Fort Adams in Newport, Rhode Island. The teams investigate three deadly eventsthat surprisingly weren't from battle!

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Houghton Hears A Who?
programme.desc: TAPS investigates Houghton Mansionin North Adams, Massachusetts where the repercussions of a deadly car accident could be behind unexplained phenomena on the property.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Darker Learning
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS has been called to investigate Southern Vermont College in Bennington, Vermont. The legend of a mysterious love triangleand suicidescould be at the root of frightening paranormal activity.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Innocent Until Proven Dead
programme.desc: TAPS has been called to Louisville, Kentucky to help three descendants find out if their ancestors arestill inhabitingthe property they owned in the 1800's.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Guns & Ice
programme.desc: The following day is Dog's birthday but that won't stop him from chasing a fugitive, who is facing firearms charges. Dog doesn't relish the thought of going after an alleged gunslinger on his birthday but he's never one to avoid a challenge.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Good Fight
programme.desc: Dog and Beth have to be at the state capitol bright and early to receive an award for their fight against ice in Hawaii. Afterwards, they're inspired to start the hunt for Shanna, an alleged ice user and identity thief with $80,000 in bonds.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Smackdown of Baby Lyssa
programme.desc: After meeting with the cosigner on a bond for a man named John, Dog and the Posse hatch a plan to lure him to a high rise apartment. But when night falls, their plan leaves a member of the team alone and in harm's way!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Friend in Need
programme.desc: Roger has 27 prior arrests, spent years in jail and doesn't want to go back. But he's missed court and now Dog has to bring him in. To complicate matters, this fugitive lives in a tightly-knit community where good information won't come easy.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Your Lying Eyes
programme.desc: Kolani's on the run, left his wife to look after four kids and left Dog holding the bag for the $10k bond. So their pursuit on this case takes them into some parts of Ohau, and the human heart, that few of us will ever see.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Crime Don't Pay
programme.desc: Today the crew is hunting for Holly, a car thief. She's one of Tim's bonds and the entire Dog crew knows that means trouble - or at least a long and difficult chase.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Twisted Love
programme.desc: Dog is tracking down Cecilia, who's wanted for car theft, but she's nowhere to be found. Her girlfriend and co-signer has gone missing too. Just when the trail goes cold, a friend leads the team to the cosigner's empty apartment.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Where the Wild Things Are
programme.desc: Dog, Beth and the team are in Colorado and they face a special challenge - getting the kids to camp. After the drop-off, Dog is more than ready to track down a fugitive. Robin disposed of a body after a homicide, and now he's skipped his court date.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Luv Still
programme.desc: Dog is in search of a potentially dangerous fugitive, he's only 19 and charged with kidnapping and menacing. The case takes an unexpected turn when the Chapman clan ends up in a confrontation with the suspect's family.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drive-In Revivin'
programme.desc: Korie challenges Willie to come up with a romantic gesture without spending any money. Missy and Jase compete to see who can find a girlfriend for Mountain Man.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fishful Thinking
programme.desc: Jase's hopes to win the inaugural Duck Commander Fishing Tournament is buoyed when he is able to enlist the help of legendary angler Bill Dance. Meanwhile, Willie's vanity over his greying beard leads him to make a questionable decision.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: When Doves Fry
programme.desc: Jase and Jep make a deal with Mia and Merritt to get them to go dove hunting with them. Si tries to make some extra cash by starting a West Monroe tour.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Carpnado
programme.desc: Jumping Asian carp have invaded Monroe's waters so Jase and the guys set out to try to stop them from spreading further. Meanwhile, Willie and Si have to run Willie's Duck Diner for the day.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Campfire Diaries
programme.desc: The family spends a weekend at their childhood summer camp, reliving old memories and working to repair a tennis court Willie built twenty years ago. While at the camp, Jep tries to pass a lifeguard swimming test he failed as a teenager.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Rowdy's Big Day
programme.desc: Rowdy's adoption is finalized and he officially becomes a Robertson. Jase gets his first massage and enjoys it more than he expected.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Disappearing Acts
programme.desc: After Willie and Jase lose Si's tea cup, Si makes them go to great lengths to find it. When the entertainment for Gus's 1st birthday party falls through, Jep fills in as a magician.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Dance Dads
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Grass & The Furious
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck for the Duckmen when an old high school nemesis challenges them to a good old-fashioned race.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Driving Miss Sadie
programme.desc: With Sadie's driver's license test fast approaching, she finds herself in dire need of lessons. Willie, Jase and Si each set out to correct her glaring failures behind the wheel by teaching her how to drive... Robertson-style.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Truck Commander
programme.desc: After Willie's son, John Luke, leaves Willie's pickup in the driveway with a bone-dry gas tank, Willie and Korie decide that it's time to get the kid his own car.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Chuck Walks
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits. Joe clashes with the maintenance department when a series of delays puts the sale of an old Canso waterbomber in jeopardy.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Gear Up, Gear Down
programme.desc: Frustrated with her lack of flying and stuck in a rut as a courier driver, Audrey decides her time at Buffalo is over. Devan, Ian and Jimmy deal with a hydraulic fluid leak in the C-46 on the valley run.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Big Boost
programme.desc: When a ferry breakdown causes a gasoline shortage, Duane begs Chuck to return and prepare the Electra for a fuel haul. Cory leads a rescue mission to retrieve an abandoned C-46 and Mikey escapes to Ottawa for a birthday joyride in a fighter jet.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Power Struggle
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck. Kelly plans her Mexican wedding, but Jynelle's sudden resignation leaves her in the lurch.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Make a Mark
programme.desc: Bryan Jr. makes a mark in the self-proclaimed log home capital of the world. Back at the yard, Andre tries to control Peter when his pent-up creativity goes in overdrive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Players Club
programme.desc: When this couple met on the internet, they instantly hit it off. Though, when Ray found out Raina was creating sexy videos for pay, he wasn’t so keen. He believes that she is meeting up with her followers and having relations for more money.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 1
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesn’t come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 2
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesn’t come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: My Money
programme.desc: Barbara says Alicia is a cheater and a thief. Barbara's seen Alicia’s text messages from men and asserts she is verbally abusive and financially irresponsible. Alicia says Barbara is controlling, a liar, selfish and never committed to their marriage.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Not Man Enough
programme.desc: No matter how hard Demont tries, he's always looking up at the bar Reasha keeps raising. Demont got a promotion and relocated for work, which raised her suspicions of him cheating. Can this couple ignite the spark or is this relationship totaled?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her “hot girl summer.” Not only that, but he doesn’t trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isn’t ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hashtag Freaky
programme.desc: Anita says Ronald is a chronic cheater and a sex addict. He demands sex constantly and when doesn’t get his way, he admits he feels forced to seek sex outside the marriage. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Can't Buy Love
programme.desc: Chimira gets lavish vacations, gifts and a designer wardrobe from Bennie, but suspects he is cheating on her. Bennie says she should be grateful for her good life. Can Bennie learn to give his time and support instead of luxuries and an empty home?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Family Guy
programme.desc: Jazmin's final straw was when Darren brought another woman over and lied about Jazmin being his sister and his daughter being his niece. Darren feels he's a good father who pays the bills and doesn't need to answer to anyone if he's not married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Brexit
programme.desc: Over 17 years of marriage Leon has had countless affairs with other women and Siobhan has had it. She claims all he wants is for her to keep his house clean and pick up after him. Leon argues that the problems stem from Siobhan’s bad drinking habits.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Quanasia can no longer deal with Chandler's lying just so he can have his affairs. Chandler says she lost her drive after having his kids. Can Judge Toler wake her up from Chandler's hypnotizing charm or is this couple a lost cause?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Caught Up
programme.desc: Syncere says Mark has lied and disrespected her on several occasions and she’s not going to stand for it anymore. Mark says he cheats on Syncere because she has a bad attitude and she gets on his nerves.

programme.title: Operation Repo: M.I.A. & D.E.A
programme.desc: When Matt and Froy go missing, Sonia is on a mission to figure out what they've got up their sleeves.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Suspicious Packages
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy repo a hummer from a bachelorette who is down to party, but when the cops arrive it's the repo team who is in for a shock.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: What do you do when you have a fugitive you not only want to find, but believe can be helped back onto the straight and narrow? If you're Mary Ellen you call your good friend Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Match Point
programme.desc: Duty calls and the Chapmans are off on a hunt. The team chases a fugitive who has disappeared into a world of "no known addresses."

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Menehune Mischief
programme.desc: When Beth returns to the compound on the Big Island she finds a damaged SUV and two possible culprits - Dog or Justin. Pressed by Beth, Dog offers a third option. The perpetrators are Hawaii's mythical mischief makers - the Menehune!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mister Mom
programme.desc: It's been quite a while since Tim Chapman put down his mace can and bulletproof vest to care for his growing family. When his old friend Dog calls asking for help tracking an elusive felon, Tim jumps into action.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait & Snitch
programme.desc: With the aid of the runner's girlfriend the posse heads out to bring a client with a checked past in. Little does the team suspect that before the end of the day Dog will be helping to mend a family torn apart by violence.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Scared Straight
programme.desc: Dog tracks a fugitive who is on the run from the law for the first time. Reading the file Dog knows the young man's life is at the crossroads. Will he be able to track down this wanna-be-gangsta in time to convince him to make the right choice?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All My Children
programme.desc: For a guy who started life as a free spirited outlaw-biker Dog has certainly turned into a family man. His children touch everything he does today, from searching for the perfect gift for his daughter Cecily's birthday to hunting a fugitive.

programme.title: The Game: Tasha, Renee and Malik The Cliché
programme.desc: When Renee is unable to engage in romantic affairs with Malik after she learns that he lives with his mother; it prompts Malik to ask Melanie for advice, and eventually explain to Tasha that they will need alternate their living arrangements.

programme.title: Run's House: Rev's Baby Girl
programme.desc: It's time for JoJo and his group, Blackout, to hit the studio and begin recording tracks for their record. However, JoJo, Zach and Reggie are discouraged by the list of producers Latchkey Recordings has available to them.

programme.title: Run's House: Baby Comes Home
programme.desc: Rev and Justine return from visiting their adopted baby they'll soon be able to call their own. They get the family excited with the news that they will have a new sister living in the house in a few days.

programme.title: Run's House: Mind on the Road
programme.desc: Season Five kicks off when Rev Run home for a short visit in between gigs of his concert tour with good pal, Kid Rock.

programme.title: Run's House: Bonless Chicken Dinner
programme.desc: The episode begins with Rev Run on stage in what is his final performance of his tour with Kid Rock. Rev returns home and his hopes of getting his diet back on track are thwarted by Russy's new cooking hobby.

programme.title: Run's House: Pass The Frame
programme.desc: With the final mix of their debut album just around the corner, Team Blackout takes the next step in their pursuit of ultimate rap dominance: self-promotion.

programme.title: Run's House: Outside The Box
programme.desc: Making the Honor Roll has been something Rev and Justine have come to expect from Diggy and Russy over the years. So when their latest report cards show them not making it, Rev confronts the boys about it.

programme.title: Run's House: Mole Beauty, Mole Problems
programme.desc: A trip to the orthodontist for Diggy and Russy brings the family some surprising news: That Russy will be getting his braces off before Diggy, who will have to wait another two months.

programme.title: Run's House: Rev's Ol' Wild West
programme.desc: With their Spring Break on the horizon, Diggy and Russy try to convince Rev and Justine to take them on a trip. Rev decides that the family should take the vacation package that he won in a Rush Philanthropic charity auction.

programme.title: Run's House: Age Against The Machine
programme.desc: With their first book written together, "Take Back Your Family," now complete, Rev and Jus begin the process of recording the book on tape version.

programme.title: Run's House: Operation Album Drop
programme.desc: Team Blackout's media blitz continues as they hold a radio interview in support of their first live performance. But when the band finds out they're being assigned a choreographer for the gig they are resistant.

programme.title: Paranormal State: School House Haunting

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hell's Gate

programme.title: Paranormal State: Bedroom Eyes

programme.title: Paranormal State: Get Out of This House

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Name

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Guys Cliffe House Pt2

programme.title: Arthur: Francine's Split Decision/Muffy Goes Metropolitan
programme.desc: Lakewood Elementary is sure to win the big bowling tournament on Saturday, but Francine's cousin is having his Bar Mitzvah at the same time! Muffy happily accepts an invitation to spend the weekend in the bustling Crown City.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W., All Fired Up/I'd Rather Read It Myself
programme.desc: When Ms. Morgan announces they'll be having a fire drill during preschool, D.W. wants no part of it--it sounds way too scary. Then, the Tibble Twins are better than D.W. at just about everything.

programme.title: Arthur: When Carl Met George/D.W. Swims with the Fishes
programme.desc: George is excited about his new friend, Carl. Then George learns that Carl has Asperger's Syndrome – can they remain good friends? D.W. and James enter the pre-school swim meet and recruit their big siblings to coach them.

programme.title: Arthur: The Tattletale Frog/D.W. & Bud's Higher Purpose
programme.desc: When Bud is blamed for an accident D.W. causes, she has to decide whether to let her friend take the fall. D.W. and Bud can't wait to ride a new rollercoaster. Will they make it past the ticket taker, or will they come up short?

programme.title: Arthur: Sue Ellen's Lost Diary/Arthur's Knee
programme.desc: Poor Sue Ellen has lost the one thing she's never without--her diary. Then, Arthur's hurt his knee but won't tell Mom--because then she'd know he'd been playing down at the dump , where he was NOT allowed to go.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Toy Trouble/Spar for the Course
programme.desc: It's a race to the toy store after Arthur realizes he may have given away his chance at 2 million dollars! Unless Muffy, Buster, and Binky can comprise, they'll be stuck with a boring windmill at the new 18th hole at the mini golf course.

programme.title: Arthur: Baseball Blues/Brain's Biggest Blunder
programme.desc: It's Grebelings season and George can't wait to play! After all, no one knows more about baseball than George. Then, wBrain gets teamed with Buster and Binky in the annual Arithmattack competition.

programme.title: Arthur: Background Blues/And Now Let's Talk To Some Kids
programme.desc: Wouldn't it be cool to find out that your ancestors were famous frontier explorers? But what if they were just...plain folks? The Magic Toolbox show is coming to Ratburn's class to put the kids on TV!

programme.title: Arthur: The Lousy Week/You Are Arthur
programme.desc: An army of lice has descended on the heads of Lakewood Elementary. Who or what is strong enough to defeat them? What if you could be Arthur for a day? View Arthur's life through his very own eyes for this special episode.

programme.title: NEW: Great Tank Battles of World War II
programme.desc: The fourth episode sees the Germans well and truly on the retreat and the Allies are able to successfully implement operation Husky: the landing on Sicily.

programme.title: War Story: Bomber Command: Hitting Back
programme.desc: After surviving the German bombing campaign of British cities, RAF Bomber Command struck back against Germany. The devastating consequences of raids, for both for the young men in the skies and the people on the ground, are portrayed in this film.

programme.title: War Story: Bomber Command: Getting Home
programme.desc: In this film, Bomber Command personnel and a Luftwaffe pilot take the viewer through the frightening reality of fighting in the skies as they try to get a damaged bomber home.

programme.title: War Story: Bomb Girls Remember
programme.desc: During the Second World War, 250,000 Canadian women helped to build the arsenal of democracy. These young women met the challenges of factory work and helped to win the Second World War, and by doing so, paved the way for future generations.

programme.title: War Story: Sicily: The First Campaign
programme.desc: The Sicily Campaign began with the largest seaborne invasion in history on 9-10 July 1943. The Allied forces of Britain, Canada, and the United States sought to knock Italy out of the war and attack Germany from the south.

programme.title: War Story: Ortona: The War Inside
programme.desc: The War Inside is a personal retelling of one of the fiercest battles of the Italian Campaign from the searing points of view of Canadian infantrymen, a tanker, a stretcher bearer, and a German paratrooper.

programme.title: War Story: The Road to Rome
programme.desc: The Road to Rome examines the incredible experiences of Canadian veterans, the victories and horrors of armoured combat, and the pivotal value, far too often neglected, of the overall Italian Campaign.

programme.title: War Story: Out of the Clouds: Paras in Normandy
programme.desc: In Normandy, the 1st Canadian Parachute Battalion proved itself to be in the vanguard of the best-trained and toughest units in the Allied forces.

programme.title: War Story: Across the Rhine: Paras in Germany
programme.desc: In mid-September 1944, the remnants of the battered 1st Canadian Parachute Battalion participated in the largest parachute drop in history, fought a successful battle.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Vince can't seem to escape his online-ex, Alyssa, whose stalking has caused his real life girlfriend, Liz, to break up with him. Nev and Max help Vince confront Alyssa so he can try to salvage a future with Liz.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Kailani has fallen for Sam, her gay friend's online ex-boyfriend. Sam claims to love Kailani, but has been acting strange since she has tried to meet up with him. Nev and Max investigate. (S6, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: After months of sexting with a hot model he met on a hookup app, Marvin is eager to meet him in person. Max and sidekick, singer Chantal Claret, agree to help Marvin find his crush. (S6, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Keyonnah & Bow Wow
programme.desc: Superfan Keyonnah can hardly believe her luck, she's almost certain that she's been having an online relationship with her childhood crush, the rapper Bow Wow. Is this too good to be true?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Chitara & Priscilla
programme.desc: Chitara took a big leap and came out to her family when she met Priscilla online, but Priscilla ended their relationship unexpectedly. Now Chitara is determined to find out what happened. (S4, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Daisy & Marcus
programme.desc: Daisy met Marcus on Instagram and he instantly stole her heart. But Marcus won't speak to Daisy on the phone, let alone meet her in person, so Nev and Tyler try to arrange a face to face. (S4, ep4)

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 117
programme.desc: Aja confesses her feelings to best friend Charles. Paulie tries to convince his friend Bethany that there is more between them that just friendship!

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 118
programme.desc: Danielle loves to laugh and joke with Chris, but now she wants to get serious with him. Jenni met Christie about a year ago and now she's ready to bare her heart.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 213
programme.desc: Lauren has a major crush on best friend Travis, but worries it will wreck the friendship. Chris has to let co-worker Terra know he has feelings for her before it's too late.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 110
programme.desc: After going to the last two proms with Taylor as friends, Polly is ready to upgrade her relationship. Stephanie wants to retire her party girl image and ask Josh to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 119
programme.desc: Nicole wants to make her best friend of a year and a half her boyfriend. Andrew and Sarah have been friends for 5 years now he's ready to reveal his true feelings.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 203
programme.desc: Antonio will tell his long time friend, Megan, that he loves her. Stormy has to let her gay best friend know that she thinks they have something special.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 217
programme.desc: Memo has had a crush on his best friend Steph for 4 years. Percy has liked his best friend and dance partner for over 3 years and she has no clue.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 111
programme.desc: Stephanie is tired of only fantasizing about Mike's "sexy face" and she's ready to make him her boyfriend. Sean and Kate were friends at first sight, now Sean wants to up the stakes.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 207
programme.desc: Amy tells her study partner and best friend that she's in love. Tonee wants to come clean with his feelings for his best friend Ryan.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 112
programme.desc: David tells his best friend Maia that he's been in love with her for 9 years. B-Hawk tries to prove to his friend Toni that there's more to him than meets the eye.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: In 1986, 21-year-old Mitzi Nalley was brutally murdered in her Austin, Texas home. Police arrested Jonathan Wayne Nobles, who confessed to the crime and was sentenced to the death penalty.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Walking Free
programme.desc: The story of David Camm, who was convicted in two murder trials -- each eventually overturned -- and was found not guilty in his third trial for the murder of his wife and two children.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Live to Tell: One Last Hug
programme.desc: An updated report on growing dangers of dating and breakup violence, focusing on Melissa Dohme, who agreed to meet a former boyfriend, Robert Burton, for one last hug before they broke up forever. The decision nearly cost her her life.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Body of Lies
programme.desc: In 2006, 31-year-old Leisha Hurst, while attending Barstow College, began dating fellow student, 34-year-old Jeami Chiapulis. Chiapulis seemed to be the man she could settle down with. The couple had plans to marry when Hurst vanished on January 22, 2009

programme.title: 48 Hours: Live to Tell: Full Moon
programme.desc: In August 1996, Yvette Rodier and Zach Snarr went to the mountains for their date to take photos of the full moon, when a stranger drove up, pulled out a gun and opened fire. Zach was killed. Yvette, shot four times, survived by pretending to be dead.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Millionaire Manhunt
programme.desc: After a review of the circumstances surrounding the 1987 murder of Lita McClinton Sullivan and the police investigation of her husband, Jim Sullivan, the program follows Sullivan’s extradition from Thailand in 2004 and his ensuing trial for Lita’s murder.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Astrologer
programme.desc: The IMF accepts a critical mission to rescue Nikolai Kurzon, the leader-in-exile of the Baltic state of Veyska who has been kidnapped by Col. Stahl (Steve Ihnat), head of the secret police.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Echo of Yesterday
programme.desc: The resurgence of neo-Nazism in Germany takes the IMF to Bavaria, where Marcus von Frank (Hans Gudegast) threatens to become a second Hitler.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Photographer
programme.desc: The imagination of the IMF is put to the test when a massive spy ring in the U.S. headed by fashion photographer, David Redding, threatens to cripple the country with a deadly pneumonic plague.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Spy
programme.desc: NATO's missile defense system plans, mapped on two separate overlays for security reasons, are the target of a Central European spy organization.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Game of Chess
programme.desc: Recovering a million dollars in gold bullion is the job of the IMF.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ sings that he wants to be a rock and roll star. Baby Bop sings that she wants to be a country music star. BJ gets mistaken for the artist who painted a portrait of Barney.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Squares, Squares Everywhere
programme.desc: Nick's homework is to find as many squares as he can. It's great fun when Barney and the kids help!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Butterflies - Nature Of Things
programme.desc: Baby Bop is sad because she lost her pet caterpillar, Monty. Barney and the others try to help her find it. Baby Bop is surprised to discover Monty inside a chrysalis. Everyone is excited to find Monty—now a beautiful butterfly!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When Riff is asked to be captain of a baseball team, he doesn’t think he can do it. But Barney gives him the courage to try.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: The Big Garden - Get Happy
programme.desc: Baby Bop wants Barney, BJ and the kids to play with her instead of working in their garden. They promise to play with her as soon as they finish. Baby Bop can't wait, and tries many ways to get them to come play with her now, none of which work.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Day and Night
programme.desc: With a little Barney magic, the children experience the differences between day and night!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Ahora Mismo!
programme.desc: When Ben arrives too late to get a pony ride he must learn how to wait the hard way. He's always wanted a horse and now it looks as if he's missed his opportunity. Luckily, Barney takes him to Spain where they meet Regalo, a dancing horse!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When she finds out that Daniel is going on a trip the next day, Baby Bop wants to go on a trip as well. Everyone decides to pretend to travel the same way Daniel will travel.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Machine Gun Ton
programme.desc: Ton and Allen battle a pair of vicious female auction hunters who have an axe to grind and bid based on spite rather than strategy. And a gatling gun & suit of armor are worth much less than the guys expected.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Knuckle Dust
programme.desc: 1870s French Jarre Dolne Knuckle Duster revolver-knife-brass knuckle combo, a rare original George Rodrigue "Blue Dog" screenprint and a 1980 autographed Raging Bull movie poster.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Betsy's Last Stand
programme.desc: With their beloved bread truck on life support, Ton and Allen head to an auction to help save her. Will an industrial grinder and a classic Chevy be enough to mend Betsy, or will the guys be forced to say goodbye for good?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: You Foos You Lose
programme.desc: When their truck breaks down, Ton and Allen lay it all on the line to raise money to fix her. They score a Foosball table, Tommy Gun drums and to Ton's delight, a treasure trove of Twinkies, but will it be enough?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Blazing Saddles
programme.desc: Ton and Allen head to a Hollywood auction and face a new competitor with a seemingly endless cash flow. After they uncover a triple barrel shotgun and an antique camel saddle, Allen confronts an old childhood fear.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Early Bird Special
programme.desc: Vintage Shooting Star carnival game; professional Mixed Martial Arts octagon fighting cage.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Voodoo Moola
programme.desc: Allen & Ton hit a storage auction in Louisiana's Capitol City and quickly find themselves in trouble with the law! The guys uncover a pair of racing lawnmowers and then stumble on an antique barber chair from the early 1900s!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Always Money in Philadelphia
programme.desc: In Philadelphia, the guys face a shady bidder with inside information and former NFL star Vince Papale in a battle for a vintage football passing machine and a colonial musket that could be worth huge money if it's real.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Choo-Choo, Cha-Ching!
programme.desc: Ton and Allen get a surprise second chance after nearly getting shut out in the small town of Palmer. They uncover a motorized railroad maintenance car from the 1960's and a pre-WWI Japanese semi-automatic pistol.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Once a Pawn a Time
programme.desc: Ton and Allen discover that owning a pawn shop is way more trouble than they expected. With bills stacking up, even an antique ammo collection and some classic football helmets may not be enough to put the guys in the black.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Flying Ton, Creeping Allen
programme.desc: When a group of thugs try to bully Ton and Allen out of a Chinatown auction, the guys fight back, leading to a violent showdown and the discovery of both a rare Bornean blowgun and special effects wire harnesses.

programme.title: Holiday in Your Heart
programme.desc: Fourteen-year-old LeAnn Rimes wants nothing more than to sing at the Grand Ole Opry. She is invited to sing at a Christmas concert on Nashville's famous stage, but upon her arrival, she is faced with a difficult decision.

programme.title: Megan's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: When Megan is taken away from the only life she’s ever known and moves to a small town in West Virginia, she struggles to fit in. She also gives up her one true passion, dancing. But the nativity at her local church might just turn her life around

programme.title: Christmas Together
programme.desc: A woman leaves New York for LA after a break-up and falls in love while renting the guest house of a young father.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Maci and Ryan try to coordinate trick or treating with Bentley. Amber is excited about her new business venture but is let down when Gary doesn't let Leah stay with her on a school night. (S6, ep16)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Tyler's less optimistic than usual when his dad is once again released from prison. Farrah and Simon consider the status of their relationship. Maci throws Bentley a birthday party. (S6, ep17)

programme.title: Teen Mom
programme.desc: Amber has second thoughts about giving Gary full custody, Catelynn helps Tyler cope with emotions about his dad and they both reflect on the adoption, and Farrah misses Sophia. (S4, ep12)

programme.title: Teen Mom
programme.desc: Dr. Drew hosts a look at the exclusive moments we never saw with Farrah, Maci, Catelynn and Amber from the final season of Teen Mom. (S4, ep14)

programme.title: Teen Mom
programme.desc: Dr. Drew hosts the Teen Moms in front of a live studio audience. Catelynn, Tyler, and Farrah reflect on their journeys in the last four seasons. (S4, ep16)

programme.title: Teen Mom
programme.desc: Maci drops a bombshell about her relationship with Kyle, and shares the stage for the first time with Ryan's new girlfriend. Gary reflects on his journey with Amber. (S4, ep17)

programme.title: CSI: New York: Seth and Apep
programme.desc: Mac and the team partner with D.B. Russell to outsmart Christine’s kidnappers before they run out of time to save her life.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Danny and the team investigate when a young woman's body is found in a Ferrari.

programme.title: CSI: NY: Officer Involved
programme.desc: A night out for some drinks descends into a warzone.

programme.title: CSI: NY: Get Me Out Of Here
programme.desc: An initiation into a student fraternity house turns deadly.

programme.title: CSI: NY: Crossroads

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A teenage boy shoots up LVPD headquarters and holds Russell hostage.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSIs race to discover who shot Horatio.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate the brutal murder of a therapist's daughter.

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.title: Homes and Playgrounds

programme.title: Mega Machines: The Movie

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Knights of Can-A-Lot

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob’s too busy to even tell the machines what the job is for today. He takes Scrambler to the dome and the others follow. It turns out that they are going to turn the whole of the Dome into a Visitors centre and its opening tomorrow!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Ellis has a batch of Doves delivered, to use in his magic act, and asks Bob to build a dovecote for his new birds to live in. Mr Ellis realises that he has to go to work but does not want to leave the birds at home alone.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The Mayor asks Bob to build a Pets Corner in the local park. Farmer Pickles has picked up a selection of animals for it – including a chinchilla – and sends Travis and Spud off to deliver them to Bob. Unfortunately Bob runs out of chicken wire.

programme.title: Bob's Big Plan
programme.desc: When Bob and the team are building an extension to the offices of Mr Adams the local architect, Bob hears of a competition to build a brand new town in nearby Sunflower Valley, a place Bob knows very well from his childhood. Mr Adams shows Bob his idea.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Lee Rigby

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: April Jones

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Beverly Allitt

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Suzy Lamplugh

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Steven Wright

programme.desc: An alluring stranger named Danielle seeks aide from Roxton and the others after her village is taken by Trogs. But when the woman uses a voodoo doll to bewitch Roxton, the group must rescue her.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Guardian
programme.desc: Challenger is trapped and taken to a village of orphans, protected by dense jungle and a plant that feeds on fresh meat. Marguerite and Veronica must help Challenger escape before they are killed.

programme.title: The Lost World: Under Pressure
programme.desc: A handsome stranger stumbles onto the plateau and becomes close with the explorers. While he gains the attention of Marguerite and Veronica, Challenger's electrostatic accumulator is targeted.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Roxton and Marguerite discover a way through the mountain and explore the fissure in hopes of finding a way off the plateau. Instead, they discover an English town and trouble with the locals.

programme.title: The Lost World: Quality of Mercy
programme.desc: Veronica and Malone are imprisoned at a labor camp occupied by emotionless prisoners, robotic wardens, and alien rulers called Prin. The explorers must plan a prison break to free their cohorts.

programme.title: The Lost World: Mark of the Beast
programme.desc: Marguerite and Roxton discover a strange amulet that leaves the mark of a dinosaur on their skin. Those with the imprint begin to tap into their more primitive instincts.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Hermione Norris and John Thomson join up with Mark Stacey and Catherine Southon on a classic car trip through Cornwall, aiming to buy antiques for auction in London. On the way, John learns nautical history and Hermione takes off.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Lucy Alexander and Martin Roberts trade homes for antiques! Paired up with experts James Braxton and James Lewis, they scour Hampshire in search of bargains to sell at auction for profit--to benefit Children in Need.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Frances Barber and Phil Davis join Catherine Southon and Thomas Plant on a buying spree around East Sussex. Armed with £400 and a classic car, they hear a gripping tale of eccentricity and attempted murder on the way to auction in London.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Former MP and health minister Edwina Currie goes up against journalist Eve Pollard on a trip around Liverpool and Manchester. Paired with Paul Laidlaw and David Harper, Edwina goes underground and Eve sees a different side to woman's lib.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's Weatherfield versus Walford, as Shaun Williamson takes on Vicky Entwistle. In a stunning TVR Chimera, with Paul Laidlaw and Mark Stacy, they're looking to see who can turn the biggest profit at auction.

programme.title: Fast Pitch United Pro Softball
programme.desc: Coverage of softball action.

programme.title: Super Netball
programme.desc: Premier netball league action.

programme.title: Women's European Cricket Championship
programme.desc: Coverage of the women's European Cricket Championship series.

programme.title: Best of the MODUS Super Series
programme.desc: Watch Walker face Spivey in this thrilling full match replay from the Series 10 Champions Night Grand Final!

programme.title: On the Oche
programme.desc: Scott Mitchell joins Jake Kenyon for a chuck and a chat.

programme.title: Darts
programme.desc: The top performers from Series 10 return for a special Champions Week Bullseye Challenge.

programme.title: The Best of Jimmy van Schie: Top Moments & Highlights
programme.desc: Relive the best moments from Jimmy van Schie with his top highlights and unforgettable darts action!

programme.title: Darts
programme.desc: Full session replay of Series 11: Week 5, Finals Night.

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Relationship Woes
programme.desc: New mum Sassi chooses a surprising new career, Chloe clashes with her mum, Mia and Megan have relationship misery and for Amber, love is in the air. (S2, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Neil & Jasmin
programme.desc: Neil has been chatting to Jasmin for 3 years and she's stood him up 13 times. So it's up to Julie and Oobah to find out if the person Neil has fallen for...is real? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Jerry & Karla
programme.desc: Jerry needs help meeting his first love Karla. Karla claims to have already met Jerry but refuses to talk to him on the phone. Can Oobah and Nella find out if Karla is who she says she is? (S2, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Esther & Theo
programme.desc: Esther's finally found her match in Theo. But he always refuses to video call. So it's up to Julia and Oobah to find out if Theo is who he says he is. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Angelica & Jeroen
programme.desc: Angelica's been speaking to Jeroen online for three and a half years. After several failed attempts to meet, she's now desperate to find out if Jeroen is real? (S2, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Levi & Will
programme.desc: Levi is convinced Will is his dream man and broke up with his boyfriend so they could be together. After always cancelling on Levi, Oobah and Nella suspect something fishy is going on. (S2, ep2)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Ryan Ferguson: Wrongful Conviction
programme.desc: The case of Ryan Ferguson, who was released from prison in 2013, after nearly 10 years behind bars for murder. 48 HOURS team have been investigating the murder and the bizarre circumstances that put Ryan Ferguson in prison for the crime since 2006

programme.title: 48 Hours: Getting Away with Murder?
programme.desc: A report on families who have experienced the violent death of a loved one and believe they know the identity of the killer but lack evidence to back the charge.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Why Did Josh Kill?
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Maddie Clifton of Jacksonville, Florida went outside to play and never came back. Seven days later a city-wide search led to the home of Josh Phillips, a 14-year-old neighbor, where Maddie's body was found under the boy's waterbed.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Family Torn Apart
programme.desc: The murdered body of Bob Dorotik, a engineer and father of three, was found by a mountain road near his home in the foothills of San Diego, Ca. Despite her denial of any involvement, Jane, Dorotik’s wife of 30 years, was arrested for the crime.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: The investigation into the death of a woman's husband reveals he is not the first man she married who died under suspicious circumstances.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Time to Kill
programme.desc: 17-year-old Sterling Barber was accused of murdering Gerald Douglas Wyatt, a church deacon. The Carnesville, Georgia teenager claimed that he acted in self-defense because Wyatt, known to be a predator, was trying to molest him.

programme.title: The Terror
programme.desc: A young officer in Napoleon's army pursues a mysterious woman to the castle of an elderly Baron.

programme.title: Teen Wolf: Family Secret
programme.desc: Scott's family album of werewolves gets mixed up in the back of Mick's car. He and his friend Stiles hunt it down in order to protect the Howard family secret.

programme.title: Teen Wolf: The Werewolf Buster
programme.desc: A werewolf hunter comes to the town of Wolverton. Scott and his family must find and warn Grandpa, who is hunting turkey in the woods.

programme.title: Teen Wolf: Shopworn Wolf
programme.desc: Scott tries to earn money to pay for an electric guitar. He helps at his dad's shop, but finds raising money is a lot more difficult than he expected.

programme.title: Teen Wolf: The Beast Within
programme.desc: Scott and his family mysteriously become unable to control their wolf-outs and worry that the town monster, that has been covered in recent news reports, is actually them.

programme.title: Teen Wolf: Up A Family Tree
programme.desc: Scott's werewolf family comes to town for a family reunion. Scott's cousin, Eva, goes on a date with Mick, and it's Scott's responsibility to protect the family secret before it's revealed that Eva is a werewolf.

programme.title: Teen Wolf: Grandpa's in the Doghouse
programme.desc: Pam's sheepdog, Daisy, gets loose and chases Ballard the cat. When Mr. Conroy is called to catch Daisy, he bumps into Grandpa, switches glasses with him, and takes him to the pound instead of Daisy.

programme.title: Teen Wolf: Wolf Pride
programme.desc: A film about a mean and violent werewolf is shot in Wolverton. Outraged by the poor misrepresentation of werewolves, Scott decides to be a stuntman in order to change the horror film into a comedy.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E8 - That Old Black Magic
programme.desc: Crichton's spirit is captured by Maldis. The sorcerer thrives on vengeance and hate, he brings Crais's spirit down. And the two spirits battle.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E9 - DNA Mad Scientist
programme.desc: A scientist extracts DNA from several of Moya's crew, promising them that he would be able to use it to find the location of their home planets.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E10 - They've Got A Secret
programme.desc: During routine searches for Peacekeeper beacons, D'Argo falls down a chute, destroys a Peacekeeper shield and gets ejected into open space.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E1 - Mind The Baby
programme.desc: Crichton, Aeryn and D'argo are stranded in an asteroid field while Scorpius searches for them. Their safety depends on Crais, who is nearby in Talyn.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E2 - Vitas Mortis
programme.desc: D'Argo takes part in a sacred ritual that helps an old Luxan, an Orican, to survive.
